name: Vs Gameboy Sonic (Dorkly Sonic Re-skin)
description:
Please note I have no modding experience, and this was made in around an hour.

I only made the sprite edit, unedited sprites where ripped by lorenzo on the spriters resource, rest of credits contained in the game itself.

Feel free to port this to other sites like KBH games, just credit me and it's all good.
